ROM.Changelog:
### "M" IS FINALIZED! RR "N" IS UNDER CONSTRUCTION... SEE YOU SOON?!
### RR v5.7.4 20160921-EX * by sunsettrack4 * Upstream CM + RR changes * Latest EX kernel version * The CM build is available on BasketBuild.
### RR v5.7.3 20160918-EX * by sunsettrack4 * Upstream CM, RR and EX kernel changes * ElementalX + zzmoove governor added * A new CM build with stock configuration can be found in XDA thread OP
### RR v5.7.3 20160910-EX * by sunsettrack4 * Upstream RR and CM changes * Android v6.0.1_r66 - Security Patch Level: 6 September 2016 * Latest EX kernel v0.27 included * ROM built with UBERTC 4.9 * Compatible with OxygenOS Stock Camera Port by siankatabg (available on XDA) * Stock CM version can be found in XDA thread OP
### RR v5.7.3 20160827-CM * by sunsettrack4 * Upstream RR and CM changes * Force enabled Optimizing Compiler and Optimize Everything filter for ART * Add missing VoIP acdb device * Several updates provided by arter97 and sultanxda (view my github)
### RR v5.7.3 20160821-CM * by sunsettrack4 * Upstream RR and CM changes * ROM built with GCC instead of Clang * Memory allocator + SQLite updated * Naman // Privacy Guard: Wake Up feature added, Doze optimizaions included * Several updates by arter97 included to improve battery life and performance * Use CM kernel by default - EX kernel can be found in addons menu.
### RR v5.7.3 20160813-EX * by Naman Bhalla * Upstream RR and CM changes * Improved Doze a bit more so as to not make the time stop xD * Added Wake Up Privacy Guard option (Credits: arter97) * Fixed Setup Wizard FC (Credits: martinusbe)
### RR v5.7.2 20160803-EX * by Naman Bhalla * Android v6.0.1_r61 - Security Patch Level: 5 August 2016 * Use Resurrected-ElementalX kernel by default * Include several optimizations to improve battery life * Remove new OTA app temporary - it will be included in next build again
### RR v5.7.1 20160730-CM * by sunsettrack4 * Add support for Dash Charge * Update sRGB features (Live Display) * New OTA Updates app offers MD5 Check, direct downloads and OpenRecovery script * Several updates from CM and RR (2016/07/30 9AM CEST) * Use CM kernel by default - EX kernel can be found in addons menu.
